idea:
Mumbai-based Karza Technologies, by harnessing the power of Big Data & Artificial Intelligence, is building one of the most comprehensive digital due diligence platforms to enable screening of counter parties through 700+ credible public government information sources through a singular gateway. Karza's offerings assist Financial Institutions throughout their customer journey from on-boarding [TotalKYC], Risk Assessment [Discover], Underwriting and Due Diligence [KScan], Monitoring [KWatch] and Recoveries [K-Lookup].
With more than 10 million API hits a month, and a dynamic team of 50+, we assist our clients (including leading banks and NBFCs) to transform lending by leveraging public data to the fullest in making real time and informed decisions, helping Karza on it’s way to becoming a ‘Single Source of Truth’ for due diligence across the country.
Bagging sponsorships from Microsoft BizSpark and AWS, Karza takes pride in the various accolades granted at major tech events like YesFintech, Viacom 18 – V Step, ICICI Bank and Thought Factory (Axis Bank) securing Runner up position at Fintech Valley (Vizag) Banking Challenge, Fintegrate 2018, Second Runner up at V-Step and featuring among top 20 Fintechs in India among others.
name: Karza Technologies Private Limited

idea: Operation and Maintenance of Warehouses and Terminals for Polymers, Chemicals, Petrochemicals, MS, HSD, ATF, Black Oil, Crude OIL & White goods.
name: Repono Warehousing Pvt Ltd
